title: Verify: Update Docker Compose and Deployment Configs
description:
Run automated tests for task T-075.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Update Docker Compose for local dev (orchestrator, frontend, PostgreSQL). Update backend Dockerfile for Python 3.11. Update Vercel config for Vite build output. Add environment-based config and health check endpoint.
Criteria:
- docker-compose up starts full stack in <30s
- Backend Dockerfile uses Python 3.11
- Frontend deploys with Vite output
- Health check endpoint returns correct JSON
acceptance_criteria: docker-compose up starts full stack in <30s
Health check endpoint returns correct JSON
